original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares edge up in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s shares edged up in mid day, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index (ASPI) was up 1.26 percent or 108.29 points to 8,744.20, the most liquid index S&P SL20 was up 2.07 percent or 50.77 points to 2,499.66.
